legal_resources.title: India Code
legal_resources.description: The official website for Indian laws, providing access to statutes enacted by the Parliament of India.

legal_resources.title: National Legal Services Authority (NALSA)
legal_resources.description: An organization providing legal aid and services to the marginalized and underprivileged sections of the society in India.

legal_resources.title: Supreme Court of India
legal_resources.description: The highest judicial authority in India, responsible for interpreting the Constitution and laws of the country.

legal_resources.title: Indian Kanoon
legal_resources.description: An online platform providing access to Indian case law and legal documents.

legal_resources.title: Legislative Department - Ministry of Law and Justice
legal_resources.description: The department responsible for drafting and amending laws in India.

legal_resources.title: Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC)
legal_resources.description: The nodal national agency responsible for administering customs, GST, and central excise in India.

legal_resources.title: Department of Legal Affairs - Ministry of Law and Justice
legal_resources.description: The department responsible for advising the government of India on legal matters.

legal_resources.title: Law Commission of India
legal_resources.description: An executive body established to review and recommend changes in the legal system of India.

legal_resources.title: India Code Information System (ICSIS)
legal_resources.description: An online repository providing access to Central and State Acts of India.

legal_resources.title: eCourts Services
legal_resources.description: An online platform providing access to case status, cause lists, and judgments of courts in India.

legal_resources.title: United States Code (U.S.C.)
legal_resources.description: The official compilation of federal laws enacted by the United States Congress.

legal_resources.title: Code of Federal Regulations (CFR)
legal_resources.description: A codification of the general and permanent rules published in the Federal Register by the executive departments and agencies of the federal government.

legal_resources.title: Supreme Court of the United States
legal_resources.description: The highest court in the federal judiciary of the United States, responsible for interpreting the Constitution and federal law.

legal_resources.title: Legal Information Institute (LII)
legal_resources.description: A comprehensive online resource for legal information, including statutes, regulations, and case law.

legal_resources.title: FindLaw
legal_resources.description: A legal research website providing access to case law, statutes, legal articles, and other legal resources.

legal_resources.title: Justia
legal_resources.description: A legal portal offering case law, statutes, regulations, legal forms, and legal resources for lawyers, students, and individuals.

legal_resources.title: Westlaw
legal_resources.description: A legal research platform providing access to a vast database of case law, statutes, regulations, legal encyclopedias, and secondary sources.

legal_resources.title: LexisNexis
legal_resources.description: A legal research tool offering access to comprehensive legal content, including case law, statutes, regulations, and legal news.

legal_resources.title: Google Scholar
legal_resources.description: A freely accessible web search engine that indexes the full text or metadata of scholarly literature across an array of publishing formats and disciplines.

legal_resources.title: Legal Dictionary
legal_resources.description: An online dictionary providing definitions of legal terms and concepts.

legal_resources.title: American Bar Association (ABA)
legal_resources.description: A professional association providing resources, publications, and information on legal issues and advocacy.

legal_resources.title: National Archives
legal_resources.description: An agency responsible for preserving and documenting government and historical records, including legal documents and historical laws.

legal_resources.title: Legal Information Institute (LII)
legal_resources.description: A non-profit organization providing free access to legal information, including primary and secondary legal materials.

legal_resources.title: Public Library of Law (PLoL)
legal_resources.description: A free resource providing access to case law, statutes, regulations, court rules, and legal forms.

legal_resources.title: Federal Trade Commission (FTC)
legal_resources.description: A government agency focused on consumer protection and antitrust laws, providing resources and information on legal rights and responsibilities.

legal_resources.title: U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ)
legal_resources.description: A federal agency responsible for enforcing the law and administering justice, providing legal resources and publications.

legal_resources.title: Legal Services Corporation (LSC)
legal_resources.description: A non-profit organization providing access to justice and legal assistance for low-income individuals, including legal resources and referrals.

legal_resources.title: American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU)
legal_resources.description: A non-profit organization dedicated to defending and preserving individual rights and liberties, offering legal resources and advocacy.

legal_resources.title: Cornell Legal Information Institute (LII)
legal_resources.description: An online resource providing free access to legal information, including primary and secondary legal materials.

legal_resources.title: Harvard Law School Library
legal_resources.description: A library offering access to legal research materials, including case law, statutes, regulations, and legal literature.

legal_resources.title: Yale Law School Library
legal_resources.description: A library providing access to legal research resources, including databases, journals, and legal research guides.

legal_resources.title: Stanford Law School Library
legal_resources.description: A law library offering access to legal research materials, databases, and legal research assistance.

legal_resources.title: Legal Aid Society
legal_resources.description: An organization providing legal assistance and resources to low-income individuals and families.

legal_resources.title: ABA Legal Technology Resource Center
legal_resources.description: A resource center providing information and guidance on legal technology, practice management, and legal research tools.

legal_resources.title: Internet Archive
legal_resources.description: An online digital library providing access to archived web pages, documents, and multimedia content, including legal resources.

legal_resources.title: LegalZoom
legal_resources.description: An online legal service provider offering legal forms, document preparation, and legal advice for individuals and businesses.

legal_resources.title: National Association for Law Placement (NALP)
legal_resources.description: An association providing resources and information on legal employment, careers, and professional development.

legal_resources.title: American Association of Law Libraries (AALL)
legal_resources.description: An association supporting law librarians and legal information professionals, offering resources, publications, and conferences.

legal_resources.title: Google Scholar
legal_resources.description: A freely accessible web search engine that indexes the full text or metadata of scholarly literature across an array of publishing formats and disciplines.

legal_resources.title: Federal Judiciary
legal_resources.description: An online resource providing information on the federal judiciary, including court rules, procedures, and judicial opinions.

legal_resources.title: Legal Information Institute (LII) - State Law Resources
legal_resources.description: A collection of resources providing access to state laws, regulations, and legal information.

legal_resources.title: National Center for State Courts (NCSC)
legal_resources.description: An organization providing research, education, and information on state court systems and legal issues.

legal_resources.title: National Center for State Legislatures (NCSL)
legal_resources.description: An organization providing resources and information on state legislatures, legislative processes, and state laws.

legal_resources.title: National Conference of State Legislatures (NCSL)
legal_resources.description: An organization providing resources and information on state legislatures, legislative processes, and state laws.

legal_resources.title: National Archives
legal_resources.description: An agency responsible for preserving and documenting government and historical records, including legal documents and historical laws.

legal_resources.title: Legal Services Corporation (LSC) - Find Legal Aid
legal_resources.description: An online tool providing access to legal aid programs and services for low-income individuals and families.

legal_resources.title: U.S. Government Publishing Office (GPO)
legal_resources.description: An agency providing access to government publications, including laws, regulations, and official documents.

legal_resources.title: Federal Register
legal_resources.description: The official daily publication for rules, proposed rules, and notices of federal agencies and organizations, including legal documents.

legal_resources.title: Legal Services Corporation (LSC) - Self-Help Resources
legal_resources.description: An online resource providing self-help materials and information on common legal issues and procedures.

legal_resources.title: Legal Aid at Work
legal_resources.description: An organization providing free legal services and information on employment rights and workplace fairness.

legal_resources.title: American Immigration Lawyers Association (AILA)
legal_resources.description: An association providing resources and information on immigration law, policy, and advocacy.

legal_resources.title: Library of Congress
legal_resources.description: The research library that officially serves the United States Congress, providing access to legal research materials and resources.

legal_resources.description: An office providing legal resources, policies, and information on intellectual property, technology transfer, and research compliance.
